EmailTemplate.name: Reminder Email If Feedback Not Received
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: Follow Up {!Order.Contact_Name__c} for Feedback
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi Selenia,
This is a reminder to follow up {!Order.Contact_Name__c}, regarding feedback for Order {!Order.OrderNumber} .
Note: This is a system-generated email. Please do not reply to this email.
